title: Where's Ornn?
body: Hey, I would love to get some assistance on this problem, so my client updated to 7.17 but when I go to the shop, I don't see Ornn or anything else new. Is there something wrong with my game because ornn was released 5 hours ago

replies.body: He's available now via the client store.  Let me know if this is still an issue!
just wait a few hours just like with kayn the patch came out but he was available to buys couple hours later

ican't even patch  to 7.17 
and this is anoyying any idea how to help
new Champs get never released with he patch,  expect him on Thursday
Just like kayn and all others champions before him, he will be in shop in friday/saturday
